mapper.select: select * from INSHPolicyitem where id = #{id} and fairyoredi = #{fairyoredi} and nodecode = #{nodecode}
delete from INSHPolicyitem where id = #{id} and fairyoredi = #{fairyoredi} and nodecode = #{nodecode}

update INSHPolicyitem set operator = #{operator},modifytime = NOW(),noti = #{noti},taskid = #{taskid},orderid = #{orderid},applicantid = #{applicantid},applicantname = #{applicantname},insuredid = #{insuredid},insuredname = #{insuredname},carownerid = #{carownerid},carownername = #{carownername},carinfoid = #{carinfoid},standardfullname = #{standardfullname},proposalformno = #{proposalformno},policyno = #{policyno},premium = #{premium},insureddate = #{insureddate},startdate = #{startdate},enddate = #{enddate},totalepremium = #{totalepremium},agentnum = #{agentnum},agentname = #{agentname},team = #{team},closedstatus = #{closedstatus},policystatus = #{policystatus},risktype = #{risktype},paynum = #{paynum},checkcode = #{checkcode},discountCharge = #{discountCharge},discountRate = #{discountRate},amount = #{amount},inscomcode = #{inscomcode},fairyoredi = #{fairyoredi},nodecode = #{nodecode} where id = #{id} and fairyoredi = #{fairyoredi} and nodecode = #{nodecode}
